verses.text: Mamin Jehová Te ay ip, ko Diosal ach a onh yinhtil onh winhaj Jacob, nacot winhaj Dawid yet' syaelal. Nacot sti' winh ix yak' t'ayach ayic ix yalan winh:
Manh ol in och t'a yol in pat, manh ol in ek'laj jichan t'a sat in ch'at,
manh ol in mutz'laj in sat, manh ol ochlaj numnaj jab'oc in wayanh
ayic manto in b'o junok kajnub' b'aj skajnaj Jehová ko Diosal Te ay yip a onh yinhtil onh winhaj Jacob, xchikan winh.
Ha t'a Efrata ix kab' yab'ixal te' skaxail strato Dios, haxo t'a yol lum smacb'en winhaj Jaar ix ilchaj te' cuuj.
Koyec t'a stemplo Jehová, haxo ta' tzonh emec cuman t'a yichanh.
Mamin Jehová, cotanh t'a a kajnub' aynhej eq'ui. Cotanh yet' te' skaxail a trato, aton b'aj scheclajel a poder.
Aokab' wach'il sb'eyb'alej heb' a sacerdote. Elokab' yav heb' icxo t'a tzalajk'olal.
Yuj tas alnakkan t'a winh a chekab' aj Dawid, manh ik'el a sat t'a winh rey sik'b'ilel uuj.
Ach Jehová, ix ak'kan a ti' t'a winhaj Dawid t'a sjichanil to manh ol a k'exlaj tas ix ala', ayic ix alan icha tik: Ha junok uninal ol wak'kanoch reyal a k'exuloc.
Tato sk'anab'ajej in trato heb' inhtilal yet' tastac ol wal t'a heb', ol ochnhej heb' t'a a despacho t'a masanil tiempo, xa chi t'a winh.
Mamin Jehová, a ach ix a sik'kanel lum tzalan Sion yic tzach kajnaj ta', yujto icha chi' snib'ej a k'ool.
Ix alan icha tik: Aton jun tzalan tik b'aj in gana tzin kajnaji. Ol in kajnaj t'a lu'um yujto icha chi' ix aj schaan in k'ool.
Manh jantacoc wael uk'el ol wak' t'a heb' ayek' kajan ta', ol wak'an b'ud'joc sk'ool heb' meb'a'.
Ol in col heb' sacerdote. Axo heb' ol in k'anab'ajanoc, ol wak' awajk'e heb' yuj tzalajk'olal.
Ha t'a Sion chi', ol wak'och jun yinhtilal winhaj Dawid reyal. Ha winh sik'b'ilel wuuj, manhxa b'ak'uinh ol yaktej heb' yinhtilal winh yak'an reyal.
Ha heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'a winh ol wak'kan q'uixwelal heb'. Axo yopisio winh, ol wik'chaanh, xa chikan ach Jehová.
